channel.title: Code Make Good
channel.description: Recent content on Code Make Good

item.title: It starts
item.description: Hey, another developer blog! For the curious, this blog is built on Hugo, a fairly nice and easy to use static site generator, using the 'Manis' theme (Indonesian for 'sweet') until I build something more personal, and hosted by Netlify. Why did I call this blog "Code Make Good"? Because "Tom Armstrong" is a generic enough name that all the clever domain variations are taken, because it seemed like a pity summary of what I aim for in my work, and because naming things is hard.
